entry.title: Change the Gun Deaths title. IT is easily googleable.

<style type="text/css">/*!
*

*
*/
/* CSS font colors for translated ANSI colors. */
.ansibold {
  font-weight: bold;
}
/* use dark versions for foreground, to improve visibility */
.ansiblack {
  color: black;
}
.ansired {
  color: darkred;
}
.ansigreen {
  color: darkgreen;
}
.ansiyellow {
  color: #c4a000;
}
.ansiblue {
  color: darkblue;
}
.ansipurple {
  color: darkviolet;
}
.ansicyan {
  color: steelblue;
}
.ansigray {
  color: gray;
}
/* and light for background, for the same reason */
.ansibgblack {
  background-color: black;
}
.ansibgred {
  background-color: red;
}
.ansibggreen {
  background-color: green;
}
.ansibgyellow {
  background-color: yellow;
}
.ansibgblue {
  background-color: blue;
}
.ansibgpurple {
  background-color: magenta;
}
.ansibgcyan {
  background-color: cyan;
}
.ansibggray {
  background-color: gray;
}
div.cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  border-radius: 2px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  border-width: 1px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: transparent;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 5px;
  /* This acts as a spacer between cells, that is outside the border */
  margin: 0px;
  outline: none;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent -40px, transparent 1px, transparent 1px, transparent 100%);
}
div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-color: #90CAF9;
  border-left-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-left-width: 1px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  border-right-color: #E3F2FD;
  border-right-width: 1px;
  background: #E3F2FD;
}
@media print {
  div.cell.jupyter-soft-selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #ababab;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
div.cell.selected.jupyter-soft-selected {
  border-left-width: 0;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #42A5F5 -40px, #42A5F5 7px, #E3F2FD 7px, #E3F2FD 100%);
}
.edit_mode div.cell.selected {
  border-color: #66BB6A;
  border-left-width: 0px;
  padding-left: 6px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #66BB6A -40px, #66BB6A 5px, transparent 5px, transparent 100%);
}
@media print {
  .edit_mode div.cell.selected {
    border-color: transparent;
  }
}
.prompt {
  /* This needs to be wide enough for 3 digit prompt numbers: In[100]: */
  min-width: 14ex;
  /* This padding is tuned to match the padding on the CodeMirror editor. */
  padding: 0.4em;
  margin: 0px;
  font-family: monospace;
  text-align: right;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Don't highlight prompt number selection */
  -webkit-touch-callout: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -khtml-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  /* Use default cursor */
  cursor: default;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  .prompt {
    text-align: left;
  }
}
div.inner_cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
}
@-moz-document url-prefix() {
  div.inner_cell {
    overflow-x: hidden;
  }
}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_area {
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  border-radius: 2px;
  background: #f7f7f7;
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* This is needed so that empty prompt areas can collapse to zero height when there
   is no content in the output_subarea and the prompt. The main purpose of this is
   to make sure that empty JavaScript output_subareas have no height. */
div.prompt:empty {
  padding-top: 0;
  padding-bottom: 0;
}
div.unrecognized_cell {
  padding: 5px 5px 5px 0px;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: horizontal;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: stretch;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell {
  border-radius: 2px;
  padding: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
  border: 1px solid #cfcfcf;
  background: #eaeaea;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
div.unrecognized_cell .inner_cell a:hover {
  color: inherit;

}
@media (max-width: 540px) {

}
div.code_cell {

}

div.input {

}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_prompt {
  color: #303F9F;

}
div.input_area > div.highlight {
  margin: 0.4em;
  border: none;
  padding: 0px;
  background-color: transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight > pre {
  margin: 0px;

/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See
 * notebookmain.js.  Such fonts will have keywords vertically offset with
 * respect to the rest of the text.  The user should select a better font.
 * See: https://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/1503
 *
 * .CodeMirror span {
 *      vertical-align: bottom;
 * }
 */
.CodeMirror {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Changed from 1em to our global default */
  font-size: 14px;
  height: auto;
  /* Changed to auto to autogrow */
  background: none;
  /* Changed from white to allow our bg to show through */
}
.CodeMirror-scroll {
  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/
  /*  We have found that if it is visible, vertical scrollbars appear with font size changes.*/
  overflow-y: hidden;
  overflow-x: auto;
}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */
  /* we have set a different line-height and want this to scale with that. */
  padding: 0.4em;
}
.CodeMirror-linenumber {
  padding: 0 8px 0 4px;
}
.CodeMirror-gutters {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
  border-top-left-radius: 2px;
}
.CodeMirror pre {
  /* In CM3 this went to 4px from 0 in CM2. We need the 0 value because of how we size */
  /* .CodeMirror-lines */
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}

div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */
  position: relative;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  z-index: 1;
}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: block;
}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {
  margin: 0px;

  display: -webkit-box;

  display: box;

}
div.out_prompt_overlay {
  height: 100%;

  border-radius: 2px;
}
div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {
  /* use inner shadow to get border that is computed the same on WebKit/FF */
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;
  background: rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.5);
}
div.output_prompt {
  color: #D84315;
}
/* This class is the outer container of all output sections. */
div.output_area {
  padding: 0px;
  page-break-inside: avoid;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;

}
div.output_area 
div.output_area

}
div.output_area img.unconfined,

}
/* This is needed to protect the pre formating from global settings such
   as that of bootstrap */
.output {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;

}

    display: box;
    box-orient: vertical;
    box-align: stretch;
    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
}
div.output_area pre {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  color: black;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after
   the prompt div. */
div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.4em;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
  max-width: calc(100% - 14ex);
}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: visible;
}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {
  text-align: left;
  color: #000;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {
  background: #fdd;
  /* very light red background for stderr */
}
div.output_latex {
  text-align: left;
}
/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */
div.output_javascript:empty {
  padding: 0;
}
.js-error {

}
/* raw_input styles */
div.raw_input_container {
  line-height: 1.21429em;

}
pre.raw_input_prompt {

}
input.raw_input {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  width: auto;
  /* make sure input baseline aligns with prompt */
  vertical-align: baseline;
  /* padding + margin = 0.5em between prompt and cursor */
  padding: 0em 0.25em;
  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}
input.raw_input:focus {

}

}

<style type="text/css">.highlight .hll { background-color: #ffffcc }
.highlight  { background: #f8f8f8; }
.highlight .c { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment */
.highlight .err { border: 1px solid #FF0000 } /* Error */
.highlight .k { color: #008000; font-weight: bold } /* Keyword */
.highlight .o { color: #666666 } /* Operator */
.highlight .ch { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Hashbang */
.highlight .cm { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Multiline */
.highlight .cp { color: #BC7A00 } /* Comment.Preproc */
.highlight .cpf { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.PreprocFile */
.highlight .c1 { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Single */
.highlight .cs { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Special */
.highlight .gd { color: #A00000 } /* Generic.Deleted */
.highlight .ge { font-style: italic } /* Generic.Emph */
.highlight .gr { color: #FF0000 } /* Generic.Error */

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Exploring-Gun-Deaths-in-United-States">Exploring Gun Deaths in United States<a class="anchor-link" href="#Exploring-Gun-Deaths-in-United-States">¶</a></h2><h2 id="Gun-Deaths-in-the-US-from-2012-2014">Gun Deaths in the US from 2012-2014<a class="anchor-link" href="#Gun-Deaths-in-the-US-from-2012-2014">¶</a></h2><h4 id="Data-is-taken-from-Five-Thirty-Eight">Data is taken from Five-Thirty-Eight<a class="anchor-link" href="#Data-is-taken-from-Five-Thirty-Eight">¶</a></h4><p>(<a href="https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/guns-data">https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/guns-data</a>)</p>
<p>Read Data Analysis projects.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">csv</span> 

<span class="n">f</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"guns.csv"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"r"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">gun_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">csv</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reader</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">f</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">gun_data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">gun_data</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Check-that-we-read-in-data">Check that we read in data<a class="anchor-link" href="#Check-that-we-read-in-data">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">gun_data</span><span class="p">[:</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[2]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>[['',
  'year',
  'month',
  'intent',
  'police',
  'sex',
  'age',
  'race',
  'hispanic',
  'place',
  'education']]</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">headers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gun_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">collections</span>

<span class="n">year_col</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
<span class="n">year_counts</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">collections</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Counter</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">death</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">year_col</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">death</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">gun_data</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">year_counts</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[4]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>Counter({'2012': 33563, '2013': 33636, '2014': 33599})</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Very-little-change-in-number-of-gun-deaths-over-3-years.">Very little change in number of gun deaths over 3 years.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Very-little-change-in-number-of-gun-deaths-over-3-years.">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">datetime</span>

<span class="n">year_c</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
<span class="n">month_c</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span>
<span class="n">date</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>

<span class="n">dates</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">death</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">year_c</span><span class="p">]),</span>
                  <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">death</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">month_c</span><span class="p">]),</span>
                  <span class="n">day</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">date</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">death</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">gun_data</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">dates</span><span class="p">[:</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[5]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>[datetime.datetime(2012, 1, 1, 0, 0),
 datetime.datetime(2012, 1, 1, 0, 0),
 datetime.datetime(2012, 1, 1, 0, 0),
 datetime.datetime(2012, 2, 1, 0, 0),
 datetime.datetime(2012, 2, 1, 0, 0)]</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">date_counts</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">collections</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Counter</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">date</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">date</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">dates</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="n">date_counts</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[6]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">

         datetime.datetime(2014, 5, 1, 0, 0): 2864,

         datetime.datetime(2014, 7, 1, 0, 0): 2884,

</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Visualize-the-data.--I-can't-understand-this.">Visualize the data.  I can't understand this.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Visualize-the-data.--I-can't-understand-this.">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">sex_col</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">5</span>

<span class="n">sex_counts</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">collections</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Counter</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">death</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">sex_col</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">death</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">gun_data</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="n">sex_counts</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[7]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>Counter({'F': 14449, 'M': 86349})</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">race_col</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">7</span>

<span class="n">race_deaths</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">collections</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Counter</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">death</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">race_col</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">death</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">gun_data</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="n">race_deaths</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[8]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>Counter({'Asian/Pacific Islander': 1326,
         'Black': 23296,
         'Hispanic': 9022,
         'Native American/Native Alaskan': 917,
         'White': 66237})</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Males-were-6-times-as-likely-to-be-a-victim-of-a-gun-related-death-than-Females-from-2012-2014.">Males were 6 times as likely to be a victim of a gun related death than Females from 2012-2014.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Males-were-6-times-as-likely-to-be-a-victim-of-a-gun-related-death-than-Females-from-2012-2014.">¶</a></h3><h6 id="How-does-this-correspond-with-suicide-rates?">How does this correspond with suicide rates?<a class="anchor-link" href="#How-does-this-correspond-with-suicide-rates?">¶</a></h6><h3 id="Whites-were-3-times-as-likely-to-be-involved-in-a-gun-death-than-blacks.">Whites were 3 times as likely to be involved in a gun death than blacks.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Whites-were-3-times-as-likely-to-be-involved-in-a-gun-death-than-blacks.">¶</a></h3><h5 id="How-does-this-correspond-with-the-proportion-of-whites/blacks-in-the-US?">How does this correspond with the proportion of whites/blacks in the US?<a class="anchor-link" href="#How-does-this-correspond-with-the-proportion-of-whites/blacks-in-the-US?">¶</a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Use-2010-US-Census-data-to-get-a-more-accurate-picture">Use 2010 US Census data to get a more accurate picture<a class="anchor-link" href="#Use-2010-US-Census-data-to-get-a-more-accurate-picture">¶</a></h1><h4 id="Read-in-our-data-(credit-to-www.census.gov)">Read in our data (credit to www.census.gov)<a class="anchor-link" href="#Read-in-our-data-(credit-to-www.census.gov)">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>

<span class="n">census_f</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"census.csv"</span>
<span class="n">census</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">census_f</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Let's-use-census-data-to-get-rates-of-deaths-per-100k-people-per-race.">Let's use census data to get rates of deaths per 100k people per race.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Let's-use-census-data-to-get-rates-of-deaths-per-100k-people-per-race.">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h5 id="The-surveys-have-different-names-for-each-race.--Let's-map-the-races-together.">The surveys have different names for each race.  Let's map the races together.<a class="anchor-link" href="#The-surveys-have-different-names-for-each-race.--Let's-map-the-races-together.">¶</a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [10]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#Map of `gun_data => census`</span>

<span class="n">race_map</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s2">"Asian/Pacific Islander"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Race Alone - Asian"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                               <span class="s2">"Race Alone - Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander"</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"Black"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Race Alone - Black or African American"</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"Hispanic"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Race Alone - Hispanic"</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"Native American/Native Alaskan"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Race Alone - American Indian and Alaska Native"</span><span class="p">],</span>
    <span class="s2">"White"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Race Alone - White"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">race_map</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[10]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>{'Asian/Pacific Islander': ['Race Alone - Asian',
  'Race Alone - Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander'],
 'Black': ['Race Alone - Black or African American'],
 'Hispanic': ['Race Alone - Hispanic'],
 'Native American/Native Alaskan': ['Race Alone - American Indian and Alaska Native'],
 'White': ['Race Alone - White']}</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Once-we-map-the-two-datasets-together.--We-can-calculate-the-deaths-per-100k-of-population.">Once we map the two datasets together.  We can calculate the deaths per 100k of population.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Once-we-map-the-two-datasets-together.--We-can-calculate-the-deaths-per-100k-of-population.">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [11]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">convert_deaths_to_per100k</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">race_deaths</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">census</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">race_map</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">deaths_per_100k</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">race</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">death</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">race_deaths</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">items</span><span class="p">():</span>
        <span class="c1"># Get the names of the race in the census that map to the gun data names</span>
        <span class="n">census_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">race_map</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">race</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">census_pops</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">census</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">name</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">census_names</span><span class="p">]</span>

        <span class="c1">#Total race population from the census data</span>
        <span class="n">race_population</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">census_pops</span><span class="p">)</span>


        <span class="n">deaths_per_hundredk</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">death</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">100000</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">race_population</span> 
        <span class="n">deaths_per_hundredk</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">deaths_per_hundredk</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">deaths_per_100k</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">race</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">deaths_per_hundredk</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">deaths_per_100k</span>
    
<span class="n">race_per_hundredk</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">convert_deaths_to_per100k</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">race_deaths</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                              <span class="n">census</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                              <span class="n">race_map</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">race_per_hundredk</span>
    
    
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[11]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>{'Asian/Pacific Islander': 8,
 'Black': 57,
 'Hispanic': 20,
 'Native American/Native Alaskan': 24,
 'White': 33}</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Deaths-per-100k:">Deaths per 100k:<a class="anchor-link" href="#Deaths-per-100k:">¶</a></h3><h5 id="Black-deaths-per-100k-are-nearly-double-the-rate-of-White-deaths">Black deaths per 100k are nearly double the rate of White deaths<a class="anchor-link" href="#Black-deaths-per-100k-are-nearly-double-the-rate-of-White-deaths">¶</a></h5><h5 id="Our-data-spans-2012-to-2014,-and-includes-all-deaths-(i.e.-Suicide,-Homicide,-Accidental,-Undetermined,-etc.)">Our data spans 2012 to 2014, and includes all deaths (i.e. Suicide, Homicide, Accidental, Undetermined, etc.)<a class="anchor-link" href="#Our-data-spans-2012-to-2014,-and-includes-all-deaths-(i.e.-Suicide,-Homicide,-Accidental,-Undetermined,-etc.)">¶</a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Look-at-types-of-deaths-in-our-gun-data">Look at types of deaths in our gun data<a class="anchor-link" href="#Look-at-types-of-deaths-in-our-gun-data">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [12]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">type_col</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">3</span>

<span class="n">death_type</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">collections</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Counter</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">death</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">type_col</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">death</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">gun_data</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">death_type</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[12]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>Counter({'Accidental': 1639,
         'Homicide': 35176,
         'NA': 1,
         'Suicide': 63175,
         'Undetermined': 807})</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Examine-homicide-gun-deaths-per-100k-broken-down-by-race">Examine <em>homicide</em> gun deaths per 100k broken down by race<a class="anchor-link" href="#Examine-homicide-gun-deaths-per-100k-broken-down-by-race">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h5 id="First,-redo-our-gun-death-counts">First, redo our gun death counts<a class="anchor-link" href="#First,-redo-our-gun-death-counts">¶</a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">homicide_deaths</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">collections</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Counter</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">death</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">race_col</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">death</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">gun_data</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">death</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">type_col</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Homicide"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">homicide_deaths</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[13]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>Counter({'Asian/Pacific Islander': 559,
         'Black': 19510,
         'Hispanic': 5634,
         'Native American/Native Alaskan': 326,
         'White': 9147})</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h5 id="There-were-19510-black-deaths-by-homicide-from-2012-to-2014-in-the-United-States.">There were 19510 black deaths by homicide from 2012 to 2014 in the United States.<a class="anchor-link" href="#There-were-19510-black-deaths-by-homicide-from-2012-to-2014-in-the-United-States.">¶</a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">race_homicide_per_hundredk</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">convert_deaths_to_per100k</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">homicide_deaths</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                                       <span class="n">census</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                                       <span class="n">race_map</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">race_homicide_per_hundredk</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[14]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>{'Asian/Pacific Islander': 3,
 'Black': 48,
 'Hispanic': 12,
 'Native American/Native Alaskan': 8,
 'White': 4}</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h5 id="There-were-12-times-as-many-Black-deaths-by-gun-[homicide]-from-2012-to-2014-in-the-United-States.">There were 12 times as many Black deaths by gun [homicide] from 2012 to 2014 in the United States.<a class="anchor-link" href="#There-were-12-times-as-many-Black-deaths-by-gun-[homicide]-from-2012-to-2014-in-the-United-States.">¶</a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>

}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_area {

}
/* This is needed so that empty prompt areas can collapse to zero height when there
   is no content in the output_subarea and the prompt. The main purpose of this is
   to make sure that empty JavaScript output_subareas have no height. */
div.prompt:empty {

}

}

}

  }
}
/* any special styling for code cells that are currently running goes here */
div.input {

}

  div.input {
    /* Old browsers */
    display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-align: stretch;
    display: -moz-box;
    -moz-box-orient: vertical;
    -moz-box-align: stretch;

    /* Modern browsers */
    display: flex;

}
/* input_area and input_prompt must match in top border and margin for alignment */
div.input_prompt {

  border-top: 1px solid transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight {
  margin: 0.4em;
  border: none;
  padding: 0px;
  background-color: transparent;
}
div.input_area > div.highlight > pre {
  margin: 0px;

  background-color: transparent;
}
/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See
 * notebookmain.js.  Such fonts will have keywords vertically offset with
 * respect to the rest of the text.  The user should select a better font.
 * See: https://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/1503
 *
 * .CodeMirror span {
 *      vertical-align: bottom;
 * }
 */
.CodeMirror {
  line-height: 1.21429em;
  /* Changed from 1em to our global default */
  font-size: 14px;
  height: auto;
  /* Changed to auto to autogrow */
  background: none;
  /* Changed from white to allow our bg to show through */
}
.CodeMirror-scroll {
  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/
  /*  We have found that if it is visible, vertical scrollbars appear with font size changes.*/
  overflow-y: hidden;
  overflow-x: auto;
}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="The-Thanksgiving-data**">The Thanksgiving data**<a class="anchor-link" href="#The-Thanksgiving-data**">¶</a></h2><p>This data came from Five-Thirty-Eight's data repository. I give them full credit for the collection of the data.   <a href="https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/tree/master/thanksgiving-2015">https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/tree/master/thanksgiving-2015</a>)</p>
<p>** <em>This data is no way representitive of the total US population.  Five-thirty-eight polled 1058 respondants on Nov 17th 2015.  Furthermore, due to small sample size, data is unlikely to be statistically significant.  This project was for learning purposes (NumPy, Pandas, Jupyter).  </em></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Goals">Goals<a class="anchor-link" href="#Goals">¶</a></h2><p><strong> Some important questions that we set out to answer during this project!</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>What is the most popular dish at Thanksgiving dinner?  What is the most popular meal?</li>
<li>What percent of people pass on the pie during Thanksgiving?</li>
<li>Is travel correlated with age or income?</li>
<li>Is celebrating Friendsgiving correlated with age? </li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Motivations">Motivations<a class="anchor-link" href="#Motivations">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li><p>A large chunk of my work over the past 3 months has been focused on Ruby on Rails.  Python is syntactically very similar to Ruby.  Python and Ruby are both high level languages.</p>
</li>
<li><p>Python gives us access different libraries for Data Analysis, which makes it an attractive language to pick up to use for Data Science.</p>
</li>
<li><p>In this post, we will explore Pandas and Numpy;  two cool libraries used for Data Analysis.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Numpy:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Makes it easy to create and manupulate data stored in multi-dimensional arrays.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Pandas:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Build on top of numpy</li>
<li>Flexibility to hold data of different types!</li>
<li>Flexibility to deal with missing values.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>  

<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"thanksgiving.csv"</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                   <span class="n">encoding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"Latin-1"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">convert_age</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isnull</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="n">age</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">" "</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">age</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">age</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"+"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">age</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">convert_income</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">):</span> <span class="c1"># i.e. $10,000</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isnull</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">None</span> 
    
    <span class="n">income</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">" "</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">income</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Prefer"</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">None</span>
    
    <span class="n">income</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">income</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"$"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">income</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">income</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">","</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">income</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">#==> 10000</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="input_area">

<span class="n">americans</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"int_income"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">americans</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">income_q</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">convert_income</span><span class="p">)</span>

<h2 id="Calculate-breakdown-of-travel-by-Income">Calculate breakdown of travel by Income<a class="anchor-link" href="#Calculate-breakdown-of-travel-by-Income">¶</a></h2><h5 id="Test-the-hypothesis-that-low-income-earners-are-more-likely-to-travel-due-to-them-travelling-to-their-parents-house">Test the hypothesis that low income earners are more likely to travel due to them travelling to their parents house<a class="anchor-link" href="#Test-the-hypothesis-that-low-income-earners-are-more-likely-to-travel-due-to-them-travelling-to-their-parents-house">¶</a></h5>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h6 id="First-create-a-pivot-table-broken-down-by-Travel-and-Income">First create a pivot table broken down by Travel and Income<a class="anchor-link" href="#First-create-a-pivot-table-broken-down-by-Travel-and-Income">¶</a></h6>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">travel_q</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"How far will you travel for Thanksgiving?"</span>
<span class="n">index_id</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"RespondentID"</span>
<span class="n">income</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"int_income"</span>
<span class="n">no_travel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Thanksgiving is happening at my home--I won't travel at all"</span>


<span class="n">travel_by_income</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pivot_table</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">americans</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                  <span class="n">values</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">index_id</span><span class="p">],</span> 
                                  <span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">travel_q</span><span class="p">],</span>
                                  <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">income</span><span class="p">],</span>
                                  <span class="n">aggfunc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">margins</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># next calculate percentabes by value </span>

<span class="n">travel_by_income_as_pct</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">travel_by_income</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">div</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">travel_by_income</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,:],</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">pct_no_travel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">travel_by_income_as_pct</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">no_travel</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">pct_travel</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">pct_no_travel</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pct_travel</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<h4 id="Without-performing-Statistical-Analysis-on-the-Data,-it-is-hard-to-say-if-these-numbers-are-significant.">Without performing Statistical Analysis on the Data, it is hard to say if these numbers are significant.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Without-performing-Statistical-Analysis-on-the-Data,-it-is-hard-to-say-if-these-numbers-are-significant.">¶</a></h4><ul>
